instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3330: What is 820-3330? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.SMC_LID: What is SMC_LID? SMC_LID tells the machine the system is open when it is 3.3v to 3.4v, and closed when it is low such as 0v-0.6v. When this signal is low, the machine may go to sleep or have no backlight. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3330</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Booting but no video output
threads.message: I have an <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3330</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> board that was not spilled on. Everything seems to be booting, voltages are testing normal, chimes, but no video output to screen or external display. It has 3.3V on pin 4 of the lcd connector. I have two known good screens and another functional board that I'm comparing it to. Any ideas about this?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3330</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Booting but no video output
threads.message: GPU Vcore present on L8930? <SIGNAL>SMC_LID</SIGNAL> high?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3330</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Booting but no video output
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3330</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Booting but no video output
threads.message: No idea, maybe heat the GPU a bit to see if it works again.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3330</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Booting but no video output
threads.message:
did you guys figure out the problem? having an exact same board here and would appreciate any advice. having no clues at this moments.,

thank you

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3330</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Booting but no video output
threads.message: Make a new thread with measurements.
